Uses of Class
freemarker.core.CFormat

  • Packages that use CFormat 
    Package Description
    freemarker.core
    The seldom used or advanced parts of the fundamental FreeMarker API, compared to freemarker.template.
    freemarker.template
    The fundamental, most commonly used API-s of FreeMarker; start with Configuration (see also the Getting Started in the Manual.)

    • Uses of CFormat in freemarker.core

      Subclasses of CFormat in freemarker.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractJSONLikeFormat
      Defines the methods in CFormat that are the same for all JSON-like languages.
      class  AbstractLegacyCFormat
      Super class of CFormat-s that merely exist to mimic old ?c behavior for backward compatibility.
      class  Default230CFormat
      Corresponds to the behavior of ?c if Incompatible Improvements is less than Configuration.VERSION_2_3_21.
      class  Default2321CFormat
      Corresponds to the behavior of ?c if Incompatible Improvements is between Configuration.VERSION_2_3_21 and Configuration.VERSION_2_3_31.
      class  JavaCFormat
      Java CFormat.
      class  JavaScriptCFormat
      JavaScript CFormat.
      class  JSONCFormat
      JSON CFormat; when this is used, values output by ?c are valid JSON values, and therefore also valid JavaScript values.
      class  XSCFormat
      CFormat for outputting XML that follows the conventions of XML Schema.
      Methods in freemarker.core that return CFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CFormat Configurable.getCFormat()
      Getter pair of Configurable.setCFormat(CFormat).
      Methods in freemarker.core with parameters of type CFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Environment.setCFormat(CFormat cFormat) 
      void Configurable.setCFormat(CFormat cFormat)
      Sets the computer language that's used for the c, cn built-ins, and for the "c" (and "computer") number format (Environment.getCTemplateNumberFormat()).

    • Uses of CFormat in freemarker.template

      Methods in freemarker.template with parameters of type CFormat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Configuration.setCFormat(CFormat cFormat)
